name: Police Box Google Background
description: Google with a Doctor Who theme
additional_info:
First of all, I did not create this entirely by myself.. I only know a little of coding, tried a lot of other themes on this site but they didn't give me what I wanted, so I found 2 themes that I liked and just took the best parts and made it into my own theme.

What this theme does is that it displays the Doctor who background on Google's Main pages "search and picture search" with the White logo and on all the other pages it goes back to a white page for easy reading.




The themes I borrowed from are:
http://userstyles.org/styles/78621/my-google-change-background-image
http://userstyles.org/styles/78078/google-background-change
